title: Jennifer Aniston and Ellen DeGeneres share a steamy on-screen kiss
text:

Friends’ star Jennifer Aniston locked lips with Ellen DeGeneres during an appearance on her popular daytime chat show.

The steamy moment occurred as the old friends discussed the last time Ellen had kissed a man and Jen’s last kiss with a woman.

The moment came just two weeks after Ellen kissed media mogul Howard Stern on her show.

When probed about her smooch with Howard, Jen asked Ellen: “Did you enjoy it? How was it? Were you nervous? Did you kind of get into it?”

(Image: Instagram)

Ellen, who is married to actress Portia de Rossi since 2008, responded: “I mean, it was - it was pleasant”.

Jen continued to quiz Ellen, asking: “When was the last time you kissed a guy?”

Ellen quipped: “Why is everyone so shocked? I kiss guys, I kiss guys like that, I don't make out with guys, but I kiss guys on the lips - when was the last time you kissed a girl on the lips?”

Taking a second to think over her answer, Jen hesitantly replied: “I don't kiss girls on the lips, no…”

(Image: WireImage)

At this point, Ellen leaned in and planted a tender kiss on the actress’ lips, sending the audience wild.

Blushing, Jen told Ellen: “You have very soft lips…”

Ellen teased the moment on her Instagram page, with a photo of the pair locking lips.

The steamy snap was captioned: “Find out how this happened tomorrow”.
